scene.name: intro
scene.line: You rush down the tunnel, with *JOSEPH* and *LULA* close behind.
scene.option: That got kind of intense back there.
`(To EZRA.)` How do you like all this, kid?

scene.name: intense
scene.option: No wonder they're still thinking about it ...
I hope they've moved on by now.

scene.name: game
scene.option: Kind of boring, but I like boring stuff sometimes.
There's a lot of reading, but I'm really good at that anyway.

scene.name: tunnel-2
scene.line: The tunnel narrows, and soon you find yourself crawling on your hands and knees. Navigating the tunnel gradually becomes more awkward, as smooth rock gives way to jagged, crystalline surfaces.
Scratches and taps echo from the end of the tunnel â€” some short and piercing, some slower and groaning as if dampened by water.
The tunnel opens into a large room.
